title: Thresh lantern breaks rengars stealth
body:
I hate when I go to lane gank as rengar with my ult and then my thresh throws the lantern back to help me get closer. If I take the lantern I will lose stealth and also because you tried to give me the lantern they now know im ganking so we wont get anything and I wasted my ult.

Im saying this because I have seen thresh's do this before and I just want to let them know that the lantern breaks rengars stealth

replies.body:
I didn't even know the lantern broke his stealth...

Maybe it's because I ban him every game.
